zh-cn: 伟大的十月社会主义革命

description.zh-cn: 1917年俄国革命中，由布尔什维克领导的武装起义，推翻了俄国临时政府，建立了苏维埃政权。
description.en: An armed insurrection led by the Bolsheviks during the Russian Revolution of 1917, which overthrew the Russian Provisional Government and established Soviet power.

description.zh-cn: 在俄国二月革命后成立，取代沙皇专制政府的临时政权，后在十月革命中被推翻。
description.en: The provisional government established after the February Revolution in Russia to replace the tsarist autocracy, which was later overthrown in the October Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 俄国社会民主工党的一个派别，由列宁领导，在1917年十月革命中夺取了政权。
description.en: A faction of the Russian Social Democratic Labour Party, led by Lenin, which seized power in the October Revolution of 1917.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯革命家、政治家、理论家，布尔什维克党的创始人和领导人，苏联的第一位领导人。
description.en: A Russian revolutionary, politician, and political theorist, founder and leader of the Bolshevik Party, and the first head of Soviet Russia.

nodes.id: 亚历山大·费奥多罗维奇·克伦斯基

zh-cn: 亚历山大·费奥多罗维奇·克伦斯קי

description.zh-cn: 俄国革命家、政治家，俄国临时政府的第二任总理，在十月革命中被推翻。
description.en: A Russian revolutionary and politician who served as the second prime minister of the Russian Provisional Government, and was overthrown in the October Revolution.

nodes.id: 俄罗斯苏维埃联邦社会主义共和国

zh-cn: 俄罗斯苏维埃联邦社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 十月革命后建立的世界上第一个社会主义国家，后成为苏联的主要加盟共和国。
description.en: The world's first socialist state established after the October Revolution, which later became the main constituent republic of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 十月革命后，在俄罗斯境内发生的一场多方内战，主要交战方为布尔什维克领导的红军和反布尔什维克的白军。
description.en: A multi-party civil war that occurred in Russia after the October Revolution, primarily between the Bolshevik-led Red Army and the anti-Bolshevik White Army.

description.zh-cn: 由俄国临时政府在1917年宣布成立的国家，在十月革命后停止存在。
description.en: A state proclaimed by the Russian Provisional Government in 1917, which ceased to exist after the October Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1917年俄国革命期间在彼得格勒成立的工人和士兵代表苏维埃，在十月革命中发挥了核心作用。
description.en: A soviet of workers' and soldiers' deputies established in Petrograd during the Russian Revolution of 1917, which played a central role in the October Revolution.

nodes.id: 列夫·达维多维奇·托洛茨基

zh-cn: 列夫·达维多维奇·托洛茨基

description.zh-cn: 俄国马克思主义革命家、理论家，布尔什维克核心人物，十月革命的主要领导人之一，苏联红军的缔造者。
description.en: A Russian Marxist revolutionary and theorist, a key figure in the Bolshevik Party, one of the main leaders of the October Revolution, and the founder of the Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 1917年俄国革命的第一阶段，导致了罗曼诺夫王朝的终结和沙皇尼古拉二世的退位。
description.en: The first stage of the Russian Revolution of 1917, which led to the end of the Romanov dynasty and the abdication of Tsar Nicholas II.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国的末代皇帝，在二月革命中被迫退位，后在俄国内战期间被布尔什维克处决。
description.en: The last Emperor of Russia, forced to abdicate during the February Revolution and later executed by the Bolsheviks during the Russian Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 统治俄罗斯帝国的最后一个王朝，在1917年二月革命中被推翻。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty to rule Russia, overthrown in the February Revolution of 1917.

nodes.id: 彼得格勒军事革命委员会

zh-cn: 彼得格勒军事革命委员会
en: Military Revolutionary Committee of the Petrograd Soviet

description.zh-cn: 由彼得格勒苏维埃建立的军事机构，在托洛茨基领导下，是十月革命武装起义的实际组织和指挥中心。
description.en: A military body established by the Petrograd Soviet, which, under the leadership of Trotsky, was the de facto organizing and command center of the armed uprising in the October Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 俄国内战期间反对布尔什维克政权的各种武装力量的统称。
description.en: A collective term for the various armed forces that opposed the Bolshevik regime during the Russian Civil War.

zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟

description.zh-cn: 由俄罗斯苏维埃联邦社会主义共和国等多个苏维埃共和国联合组成的联邦制社会主义国家。
description.en: A federal socialist state composed of the Russian Soviet Federative Socialist Republic and several other Soviet republics.

description.zh-cn: 1917年7月在彼得格勒发生的大规模反政府示威，虽然被临时政府镇压，但加剧了政治危机。
description.en: A period of large-scale anti-government demonstrations in Petrograd in July 1917, which, although suppressed by the Provisional Government, exacerbated the political crisis.

description.zh-cn: 俄军总司令拉夫尔·科尔尼洛夫将军试图发动政变，但以失败告终。此事件削弱了临时政府，增强了布尔什维克的势力。
description.en: An attempted coup by the Commander-in-Chief of the Russian Army, General Lavr Kornilov, which ultimately failed. The event weakened the Provisional Government and strengthened the Bolsheviks.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国将军，曾任俄军总司令，在1917年发动了未遂的科尔尼洛夫事件。
description.en: A general in the Imperial Russian Army, who served as Commander-in-Chief of the Russian Army and launched the unsuccessful Kornilov affair in 1917.

description.zh-cn: 1917年选举产生的俄罗斯制宪机构，在1918年1月召开后不久即被布尔什维克政府强行解散。
description.en: A constitutional body elected in 1917 to form a constitution for Russia, which was forcibly dissolved by the Bolshevik government shortly after it convened in January 1918.

description.zh-cn: 指1918年1月布尔什维克政府强行解散俄国立宪会议的事件。
description.en: Refers to the event in January 1918 when the Bolshevik government forcibly dissolved the Russian Constituent Assembly.

zh-cn: 全俄肃清反革命及怠工非常委员会

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃俄国成立的第一个国家安全机构，以执行红色恐怖和镇压反革命活动而闻名。
description.en: The first state security organization of Soviet Russia, known for implementing the Red Terror and suppressing counter-revolutionary activities.

description.zh-cn: 布尔什维克党在俄国内战期间建立的武装力量，后成为苏联的正式军队。
description.en: The armed forces established by the Bolshevik Party during the Russian Civil War, which later became the official army of the Soviet Union.

nodes.id: 布列斯特-立陶夫斯克条约

zh-cn: 布列斯特-立陶夫斯克条约

description.zh-cn: 1918年苏维埃俄国与同盟国签订的和平条约，标志着俄国正式退出第一次世界大战。
description.en: A peace treaty signed in 1918 between Soviet Russia and the Central Powers, marking Russia's formal exit from World War I.

description.zh-cn: 1871年至1918年间的德国，是第一次世界大战中同盟国的核心成员。
description.en: Germany from 1871 to 1918, a core member of the Central Powers in World War I.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯海军上将、极地探险家，俄国内战期间白军运动的领导人之一，自称俄罗斯最高统治者。
description.en: A Russian naval admiral, polar explorer, and one of the leaders of the White movement during the Russian Civil War, who proclaimed himself the Supreme Ruler of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党，其成立和发展深受十月革命和马克思列宁主义的影响。
description.en: The ruling party of China, whose establishment and development were deeply influenced by the October Revolution and Marxism-Leninism.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary, politician and political theorist, the main founder and leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由卡尔·马克思和弗里德里希·恩格斯创立的理论体系，是十月革命的指导思想。
description.en: A theoretical system founded by Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels, which served as the guiding ideology for the October Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 俄国作家和社会主义现实主义文学的创始人，曾对布尔什维克解散立宪会议的行为提出批评。
description.en: A Russian writer and founder of socialist realism literature, who criticized the Bolsheviks for dissolving the Constituent Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯波罗的海舰队的巡洋舰，其在十月革命期间向冬宫发射空炮，被视为革命开始的信号。
description.en: A cruiser of the Russian Baltic Fleet, whose blank shot fired at the Winter Palace during the October Revolution is considered the signal for the start of the revolution.

description.zh-cn: 十月革命推翻了以克伦斯基为领导的俄国临时政府。
description.en: The October Revolution overthrew the Russian Provisional Government led by Kerensky.

description.zh-cn: 十月革命的胜利导致俄罗斯共和国停止存在。
description.en: The victory of the October Revolution led to the cessation of the Russian Republic.

relationships.target: 俄罗斯苏维埃联邦社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 十月革命后建立了俄罗斯苏维埃联邦社会主义共和国（苏维埃俄国）。
description.en: After the October Revolution, the Russian Soviet Federative Socialist Republic (Soviet Russia) was established.

description.zh-cn: 十月革命后，反对布尔什维克的势力组成白军与苏维埃政权对抗，俄国内战随即爆发。
description.en: After the October Revolution, anti-Bolshevik forces formed the White Army to fight against the Soviet regime, and the Russian Civil War broke out.

description.zh-cn: 布尔什维克是十月革命的主要领导和推动力量。
description.en: The Bolsheviks were the main leading and driving force of the October Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 列宁是布尔什维克党的领袖，也是十月革命的主要领导者。
description.en: Lenin was the leader of the Bolshevik Party and the main leader of the October Revolution.

relationships.source: 列夫·达维多维奇·托洛茨基

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基作为彼得格勒苏维埃和军事革命委员会的领导人，在组织和指挥十月革命武装起义中发挥了关键作用。
description.en: As the leader of the Petrograd Soviet and the Military Revolutionary Committee, Trotsky played a key role in organizing and commanding the armed uprising of the October Revolution.

relationships.source: 亚历山大·费奥多罗维奇·克伦斯基

description.zh-cn: 作为俄国临时政府总理，克伦斯基领导了对抗十月革命的行动，但未能做出有效抵抗。
description.en: As Prime Minister of the Russian Provisional Government, Kerensky led actions against the October Revolution but was unable to offer effective resistance.

description.zh-cn: 二月革命推翻了沙皇专制，随后建立了俄国临时政府。
description.en: The February Revolution overthrew the Tsarist autocracy and subsequently established the Russian Provisional Government.

description.zh-cn: 二月革命导致了沙皇尼古拉二世退位，罗曼诺夫王朝实质灭亡。
description.en: The February Revolution led to the abdication of Tsar Nicholas II, effectively ending the Romanov dynasty.

relationships.source: 彼得格勒军事革命委员会

description.zh-cn: 彼得格勒军事革命委员会是十月革命武装起义的直接组织和指挥机构。
description.en: The Petrograd Military Revolutionary Committee was the direct organizing and command body of the October Revolution armed uprising.

relationships.source: 彼得格勒军事革命委员会

description.zh-cn: 彼得格勒军事革命委员会由彼得格勒苏维埃建立，并受其领导。
description.en: The Petrograd Military Revolutionary Committee was established by and subordinate to the Petrograd Soviet.

description.zh-cn: 科尔尼洛夫事件失败后，布尔什维克党在苏维埃的支持度显著提高，壮大了其势力。
description.en: After the failure of the Kornilov affair, the Bolshevik Party's support in the Soviets increased significantly, strengthening its power.

description.zh-cn: 拉夫尔·科尔尼洛夫将军发动了旨在推翻临时政府的军事政变，即科尔尼洛夫事件。
description.en: General Lavr Kornilov launched a military coup aimed at overthrowing the Provisional Government, known as the Kornilov affair.

description.zh-cn: 布尔什维克政府在立宪会议召开一天后，以其拒绝通过苏维埃法令为由，强行解散了立宪会议。
description.en: One day after the Constituent Assembly convened, the Bolshevik government forcibly dissolved it on the grounds that it refused to pass Soviet decrees.

description.zh-cn: 一月剧变即布尔什维克强行解散立宪会议的事件。
description.en: The January Turmoil was the event of the forcible dissolution of the Constituent Assembly by the Bolsheviks.

description.zh-cn: 全俄肃清反革命及怠工非常委员会（契卡）秘密处决了尼古拉二世及其家人。
description.en: The All-Russian Extraordinary Commission for Combating Counter-Revolution and Sabotage (Cheka) secretly executed Nicholas II and his family.

relationships.source: 俄罗斯苏维埃联邦社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃政府于1918年1月15日颁布法令，建立了红军。
description.en: The Soviet government issued a decree on January 15, 1918, establishing the Red Army.

relationships.source: 俄罗斯苏维埃联邦社会主义共和国
relationships.target: 布列斯特-立陶夫斯克条约

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃俄国与德意志帝国等同盟国签订了《布列斯特-立陶夫斯克条约》，退出第一次世界大战。
description.en: Soviet Russia signed the Treaty of Brest-Litovsk with the German Empire and other Central Powers, withdrawing from World War I.

relationships.source: 布列斯特-立陶夫斯克条约

description.zh-cn: 《布列斯特-立陶夫斯克条约》割让大片国土，激怒了俄国国内的民族主义者，加剧了内战的爆发。
description.en: The Treaty of Brest-Litovsk, which ceded large territories, angered nationalists within Russia and exacerbated the outbreak of the civil war.

description.zh-cn: 在俄国内战期间，白军与红军是主要的敌对交战方。
description.en: During the Russian Civil War, the White Army and the Red Army were the main opposing belligerents.

description.zh-cn: 取得内战胜利后，布尔什维克领导的苏维埃俄国与其他苏维埃共和国联合建立了苏联。
description.en: After winning the civil war, the Bolshevik-led Soviet Russia, along with other Soviet republics, established the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 十月革命的胜利和马克思主义的传播对中国共产党的建立产生了深远影响。毛泽东曾评价：'十月革命一声炮响，为我们送来马克思主义'。
description.en: The victory of the October Revolution and the spread of Marxism had a profound impact on the establishment of the Chinese Communist Party. Mao Zedong once commented: 'The salvoes of the October Revolution brought us Marxism-Leninism.'

description.zh-cn: 高尔基撰文《1月9日与1月5日》，谴责布尔什维克强行解散立宪会议的行为。
description.en: Gorky wrote the article 'January 9th and January 5th', condemning the Bolsheviks' forcible dissolution of the Constituent Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 阿芙乐尔号巡洋舰于1917年11月7日晚9时45分向冬宫发射空炮，作为布尔什维克开始总攻的信号。
description.en: The cruiser Aurora fired a blank shot at the Winter Palace at 9:45 PM on November 7, 1917, serving as the signal for the Bolsheviks to begin their final assault.
